survey_brief: This survey aims to assess employees' perceptions of mental health support and resources provided by their employer, as well as identify areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the mental health support and resources provided by your employer?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency. Ensure mobile-friendly layout for ease of response.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the mental health support and resources provided by your employer?

questions.question_text: Which of the following mental health resources have you utilized in the past 12 months? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Select all applicable responses. Include a clear 'None of the above' option.

script.question_text: Which of the following mental health resources have you utilized in the past 12 months? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How comfortable do you feel discussing mental health concerns with your immediate supervisor?
questions.client_notes: 5-point Likert scale recommended. Ensure anonymity for honest responses.

script.question_text: How comfortable do you feel discussing mental health concerns with your immediate supervisor?

questions.question_text: What additional mental health support or resources would you like to see offered by your employer?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback. Provide sufficient space for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What additional mental health support or resources would you like to see offered by your employer?

questions.question_text: Has your employer's mental health support positively impacted your work performance or overall well-being?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected any option other than 'None of the above' in Q2
questions.client_notes: Conditional question based on Q2 responses. Use a 5-point scale for nuanced feedback.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button (single-choice). Apply skip logic based on Q2 responses.

script.question_text: Has your employer's mental health support positively impacted your work performance or overall well-being?
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected any option other than 'None of the above' in Q2
